response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product, tailored to your specific needs and interests, is worth $1,000,000 to you. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its true worth and the value it will bring to you. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
